&& /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/bedtools getfasta -fi $Fasta -bed $peak_bed -fo ${__tool_directory__}/$$/pos.fa && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/Rscript ${__tool_directory__}/03_get_neg.R -fasta $Fasta -peak $peak_bed -dir ${__tool_directory__}/$$/ && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/bedtools getfasta -fi $Fasta -bed ${__tool_directory__}/$$/neg.bed -fo ${__tool_directory__}/$$/neg.fa && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/python ${__tool_directory__}/03_split_fasta.py ${__tool_directory__}/$$ && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/python /home/galaxy/WeakRM-main/Scripts/token2npy.py --input_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/data/" --output_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/data/processed/" --len=$sliding_window --stride=$stride && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/tf26/bin/python /home/galaxy/WeakRM-main/Scripts/main.py --training=True --input_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/data/processed/" --epoch $epoch --len $sliding_window --lr_init $rate --lr_decay $lr_decay --stride $stride --cp_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/data/processed/" --saving=True > ${__tool_directory__}/$$/data/processed/training.txt && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/python ${__tool_directory__}/03_split_fasta_prediction.py ${__tool_directory__}/$$/pos.fa ${__tool_directory__}/$$/prediction/ && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/python /home/galaxy/WeakRM-main/Scripts/token2npy_pre.py --input_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/prediction/" --output_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/prediction/processed/" --len=$sliding_window --stride=$stride && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/tf26/bin/python /home/galaxy/WeakRM-main/Scripts/main.py --training=False --input_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/prediction/processed/" --len $sliding_window --stride $stride --cp_dir="${__tool_directory__}/$$/data/processed/" && /home/galaxy/miniconda3/envs/bio/bin/Rscript ${__tool_directory__}/03_filter.R -inputfile ${__tool_directory__}/$$/prediction/processed/prediction_score.txt -peak $peak_bed -threshold $threshold -output_dir ${__tool_directory__}/$$/ && mv ${__tool_directory__}/$$/remain_peak.bed $remain_peak && mv ${__tool_directory__}/$$/remove_peak.bed $remove_peak && rm -rf ${__tool_directory__}/$$/

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
In this function, All peaks derived from the HC transfrags are designated as positive samples and utilized as input for the weakly supervised learning framework to facilitate model training (Huang *et al*, 2021; Song *et al*, 2024).
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **Input the transfrags file:** Input the transfrags in FASTA format - **Input the peak region file:** The enriched peak region matrix in BED format
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Parameters**
- **Epoch:** The epoch of training model (default: 50) - **Rate:** The learning rate of training model (default: 1e-5) - **Window length:** The fixed-length sliding window length (default: 50) - **Stride length:** The steps length of sliding window (default: 10)
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
- **High condfidence Peak region in BED format**
